name: Bloomerang
description: Bloomerang is the Donor management software that nonprofits actually love to use. Whether you're using an out-of-the-box implementation or a custom implementation, the Bytespree connector for Bloomerang is able to download all of your Bloomerang data.
instructions:
1. Create a Private Key
    • Private keys can be generated in a Bloomerang database as an Administrator User, in User Settings.
    • Login to an Administrator User account.
    • Click the User icon in the upper right hand corner, and then Edit My User.
    • You can generate new API keys or deactivate existing API keys on this page.
    • See the Bloomerang knowledge base for more details if needed.
  2. In Bytespree, provide the Private Key for the Bloomerang connected app you just created
  3. Click "Connect to Bloomerang" in Bytespree
  4. Finish database setup
